title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash! This desk is perfect for both home and professional use. The dimensions of this desk are 59 inches in width, providing you with ample space to work comfortably. 

The desk is made from medium-density fiberboard, ensuring durability and stability. It features a beautiful Blonde Ash finish, adding a touch of elegance to any space. The desk is also scratch-resistant and water-spill resistant, making it long-lasting and easy to maintain.

In terms of storage, this desk is equipped with four drawers. These include a convenient slide-out keyboard tray, one file drawer, and three box drawers. You'll have plenty of room to organize your documents, supplies, and personal items.

Assembly of the desk is required, but don't worry, we provide clear instructions to guide you through the process. Please note that due to its weight and size, it may be necessary to have more than one person to handle the desk during assembly.

Rest assured, this desk meets the ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring its quality and reliability. 

If you prefer to have the desk assembled for you, we offer an in-home assembly service. Simply contact us at 866-388-4350 to schedule an appointment.

Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash. Order now and experience the perfect blend of style and functionality!

Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash! This stunning desk is perfect for both home and professional use. It is made of durable medium-density fiberboard and features a beautiful Blonde Ash finish. The desk measures 59 inches in width, providing ample space for all your work essentials.

The desk comes with a convenient slide-out keyboard tray, making it easy to keep your workspace organized. It also includes 4 drawers, including 1 file drawer and 3 box drawers, offering plenty of storage options. The inner drawer color may vary, adding a touch of uniqueness to each desk.

One of the standout features of this desk is its resistance to scratches and water spills, ensuring it remains in excellent condition even with regular use. The desk also meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, guaranteeing its quality and durability.

Please note that assembly is required for this desk. Due to its weight and size, it is recommended to have more than one person handle the assembly. If you require assistance, an in-home assembly service is available, and you can contact them at 866-388-4350.

Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to own a high-quality desk that will enhance your productivity and bring style to your office or home.
